thread.title: DJ and Steve of 'Full House' reunite
thread.title_full: DJ and Steve of 'Full House' reunite | Fox News

author: TVGuide
title: DJ and Steve of 'Full House' reunite
text:
Published October 02, 2015 TVGuide Facebook 0 Twitter 0 Email Print
Will high school sweethearts DJ ( Candace Cameron Bure ) and Steve ( Scott Weinger ) rekindle their romance on " Fuller House ?" It sure looks like it.
Weigner posted a photo on Instagram Wednesday of Bure kissing him, with the caption "Sorry, Internet." He also included the hashtag #iloveyoudj.
It's already been confirmed that Steve is not DJ's deceased husband on the upcoming Netflix reboot, but will she find new love with her former flame? Or will Steve appear in an imaginary "what if" scenario? Only time will tell.
Check out the photo here:
A photo posted by Scott Weinger (@scottweinger) on Sep 30, 2015 at 7:59pm PDT
Selfie with Gibbler @andreabarber #fullerhouse #donttelldeej
A photo posted by Scott Weinger (@scottweinger) on Sep 30, 2015 at 4:09pm PDT
"Fuller House" is scheduled to premiere on Netflix next year.
